title: Exclusive: Fossil fuel workers won’t be saved by Carney’s oil and gas boosterism
description: A new pipeline won’t lead to new jobs in the oil and gas sector, and the only question for government officials is whether or not to plan for the inevitable energy transition, according to new research provided exclusively to Canada’s National Observer.
